products.title: Lira Earrings
products.description: Elegant and timeless earrings crafted with high-quality sterling silver and adorned with cubic zirconia for a touch of sparkle. Perfect for both casual and formal occasions.

products.title: Hal Earrings
products.description: Minimalist earrings designed with a sleek gold finish, offering a sophisticated and modern look. Lightweight and comfortable for everyday wear.

products.title: Kaede Hair Pin Set of 3
products.description: A beautiful set of three hair pins featuring intricate floral designs, made with durable metal and enamel coating. Adds a touch of elegance to any hairstyle.

products.title: Hair Pin Set of 3
products.description: Classic hair pins in a simple yet stylish design, ideal for keeping your hair in place while complementing your outfit. Made from high-quality materials for long-lasting use.

products.title: Plain Necklace
products.description: A sleek and understated necklace made from premium stainless steel with a polished finish. A versatile piece that pairs well with any attire.

products.title: Yuki Hair Pin Set of 3
products.description: Chic and decorative hair pins inspired by traditional Japanese aesthetics, crafted with fine detailing. Perfect for special occasions or as a unique gift.
